title: Bajaj Auto crosses Rs 10,000-crore revenue mark in Q2 as local sales double
description: The manufacturer of the Pulsar and Platina motorcycles sold almost 1.2 million vehicles during the quarter, 23% more than the preceding quarter and 1% higher than a year earlier. Domestic sales almost doubled quarter-on-quarter to more than 694,000 units. Exports declined 21% sequentially to 581,000 units as the global economy faces headwinds.
